South Pacific: Fiji, Brisbane & Vanuatu | Norwegian Cruise Lines | World Travelelrs - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP South Pacific: Fiji, Brisbane & Vanuatu 12 Nights | Lautoka to Sydney Includes Free at Sea™ benefits plus US$100 onboard Credit Per Stateroom Deal Details Travel Dates 30 Nov 2026 Sale Ends Nov 30, 2025 Priced From $5,125 per person Enquire Now Includes Free at Sea™ benefits plus US$100 onboard Credit Per Stateroom Description Set sail on a journey through paradise, from Fiji’s tropical shores to Australia’s iconic coastlines. Departing from Lautoka, explore island gems like Denarau, Savusavu, and the untouched beauty of Dravuni. Dive into vibrant reefs, soak in hot springs, or simply unwind on sun-drenched beaches. In Vanuatu, discover Port Vila’s waterfalls and island culture, then relax on the white sands of Mystery Island. Your adventure wraps up in Australia with stops in Brisbane and Newcastle before finishing in stunning Sydney. A perfect blend of relaxation, culture, and natural beauty — this is the South Pacific at its finest. Pricing Oceanview Picture Window Stateroom from $5,125* per person twin share What's Included 12-night cruise with Norwegian Cruise Line® on board Norwegian Spirit® Main meals & entertainment onboard Government & Port taxes Free at Sea™ benefits: Unlimited Premium Beverages Specialty Dining Package Shore Excursion Credits Wi-Fi Package Itinerary Day 1 Embark Lautoka, Fiji Day 2 Denarau, Fiji Day 3 Savusavu, Fiji Day 4 Dravuni, Fiji Day 5 At Sea Day 6 Port Vila, Vanuatu Day 7 Mystery Island, Vanuatu Day 8 At Sea Day 9 At Sea Day 10 Brisbane, Australia Day 11 Newcastle, Australia Day 12 Disembark Sydney, Australia Your Ship Step aboard Norwegian Spirit®, where sleek design meets sophisticated adventure. Completely reimagined from bow to stern, Norwegian Spirit is your sleek, modern escape to the world’s most captivating destinations. With an intimate, mid-size design and refreshed interiors, this ship offers a boutique cruising experience with all the perks of a larger vessel — minus the crowds. Unwind in elegantly redesigned staterooms, savor global flavors at specialty dining venues, or sip cocktails under the stars at the adults-only Spice H2O. Whether you’re relaxing at the Mandara Spa, catching a show, or watching the sunset from the top deck, every moment on board is designed for comfort and connection. Norwegian Spirit is built for travelers who value style, space, and immersive experiences — the perfect ship for unforgettable journeys off the beaten path. Terms & Conditions Pricing is correct as of 05 November 2025. Airfares & transfers are additional. Savings have already been applied to advertised pricing and exclude taxes and port charges. Onboard credit is per stateroom. Onboard spend is applied to the 1st and 2nd guest in the stateroom. An NZD300 per person deposit is due within 48 hours of booking confirmation. Beverage package: Eligible guests must be 21 years at time of sailing to purchase alcoholic beverages. Guests are entitled to two beverages per person per transaction. Excludes: Excludes all drinks in the Connoisseur's Collection, Wine and Spirit Experiences, tastings or Flights, Starbucks, Ice Bars, room service, package sales, bottled water, ship specific promotions or beer buckets, designated super premium brands (subject to change), bottled wine, mini bar purchases, fresh squeezed juices, wine dispenser, energy drinks or vending machines. Further conditions apply. Wi-Fi package: Internet access of 150 minutes of high-speed Wi-Fi powered by Starlink. Provides 1 login per guest that can be used on 1 device at a time. Applicable to all guests in the stateroom. Shore Excursion Credit: Includes a USD$50 credit applicable to first guest on the cruise reservation. The first guest will receive US$50 shore excursion credit toward every shore excursion booked, per port including debarkation tours. Credit has no monetary value and is nonrefundable. Specialty Dining package: Applies to guests 1-2 on the reservation. Includes 1-4 meals at selected specialty dining restaurants on board depending on duration of cruise. Reservation is suggested prior to sailing. Some cruise staterooms are based on a 'guarantee' stateroom. The exact stateroom grade, number and location on the ship will be allocated at the discretion of the cruise line. Some staterooms have obstructed views. Subject to availability & change. Further terms and conditions apply. Experience the world differently.
